original_text: She asked me, “Please let me walk behind your workers. Then I can pick up the grains of barley that they leave on the ground.” She has worked very hard in the field since she arrived this morning. She only had a short rest in the hut.’
korean_text: 그의 말이 나로 베는 자를 따라 단 사이에서 이삭을 줍게 하소서 하였고 아침부터 와서는 잠시 집에서 쉰 외에 지금까지 계속하는 중이니이다

sentences.original_text: Please let me walk behind your workers
sentences.korean_translation: 제가 당신의 일꾼들 뒤에서 걸어가도록 허락해 주세요

sentences.original_text: Then I can pick up the grains of barley
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 제가 보리 알갱이를 줍을 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: that they leave on the ground
She has worked very hard in the field
She only had a short rest in the hut
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 오랄지 않은 오두막에서 잠시 쉬었을 뿐입니다
